thread.title: David Barton
thread.title_full: SHOWER SEAL LTD reviewed by David Barton

author: David Barton
title: David Barton
text: I had no clear idea beforehand what I needed but was helped to find out in a very simple and clear way. Payment, communication (written and phone) couldn't have been better, and delivery from warehouse was very prompt. Poor marks only to Royal Mail! Highly recommend using this company.
